网站简介 en: Search meanings in each dictionary at "one look"

网站简介: 一个针对外语学习者的问答平台

网站名称: 亚太经济合作组织官网
网站名称 en: the official website of Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC)

网站简介: 唯一支持中文及中英跨语言查询的反向词典系统,可以通过描述意思来查找词语。
网站简介 en: The only reverse dictionary system that supports cross-lingual query between Chinese and Chinese and English, and can find words by describing meaning.
